text.section: Bond and grant anticipation notes issued under this Part III of this subtitle shall be authorized by resolution of the State unit.

section.section:
The resolution shall state:
the authority for the notes and, if the notes are bond anticipation notes, the authority for the bonds;
the amount of notes authorized; and
the terms of the notes.

The resolution may provide that the notes:
be in 1 or more series, as money is required; and
be renewable at maturity with or without resale.
